data.actual_result: the video starts at 0:00 (only encountered this bug after new video embed rework)
data.expected_result: the video should load up in the embed at the time indicated by the url
data.short_description: When i send a video to a friend it started from the beginning instead of the timestamp i put on it
data.steps_to_repro: - find a youtube video (seems to affect only videos in a playlist) - right click Copy Video URL At Current Time -paste into a discord chat
